name: Grappling Cube Demo
description:
You are playing as a cube that uses grappling hook and you're trying to get to the flag, but there are some obstacles u need to avoid first!

This is my first game and I was the only one working on it, so there might be a lots of bugs so please dont worry and send me a message on my discord "Reuw#1264" or in the comment section down below.

This is just a prototype/demo, I dont know where this project will lead but I hope that I will make fun game out of it.

Follow me on Twitter to receive news of new releases and updates!
